collectionMetadata.name: Driving Licence Information - Qualified Driving Licence Holders
collectionMetadata.description: This Dataset shows the number of Qualified Drivers by their license type.

datasetMetadata.name: Qualified Driving Licence (QDL) Holders By Class Of Licence
datasetMetadata.description:
( Figures as at End-Year )

Explanatory Notes:

A person may hold more than one class of qualified driving license.

Types of class of qualified driving licence and the types of vehicles the qualified licence holders is allowed to operate:

* __Class 2B__: Motorcycle not exceeding 200cc

* __Class 2A__: Motorcycle between 201cc and 400cc
* __Class 2__: Motorcycle exceeding 400cc 
* __Class 3__: 

    1. Motor car and motor tractor, the weight of which unladen does not exceed 2500 kilograms; and 
    2. Motor cars constructed solely and adapted to carry not more than 7 passengers (exclusive of the driver) and the weight of which unladen does not exceed 3000 kilograms

* __Class 3A__: Motor vehicles which consist of any Class 3 vehicle which can be driven without the use of a clutch pedal
* __Class 3C__: Motor cars constructed solely and adapted to carry not more than 7 passengers (exclusive of the driver) and the weight of which unladen does not exceed 3000 kilograms. Issued only to work permit and S-Pass holders
* __Class 3CA__: Motor vehicles which consist of any Class 3C vehicle which can be driven without the use of a clutch pedal. Issued only to work permit and S-Pass holders
* __Class 4A__: Omnibus
* __Class 4__: Heavy motor car and motor tractor the weight of which unladen exceeds 2500 kilograms
* __Class 5__: Motor vehicle which is not constructed to carry any load and the weight of which unladen exceeds 7250 kilograms (includes light and heavy locomotives)

datasetMetadata.name: Total Number Of Persons Holding Qualified Driving Licence
